_description: On the Mercy of God — four lines

BLHar7322.Transcription: he abit þolemodlichehe furgeft litlichehe vnderfengit frelicheand he furþet holliche
BLHar7322.Note: Set out to right of column of Latin text on the same subject, “expectat pacienter, pareit faciliter, suscipit liberaltier, & obliuiscit totaliter.”
